fields.name: AuthorizationEndpoint
fields.description: The endpoint to be used to make an authorization request.

fields.name: CertificationUri
fields.description: The endpoint that provides the keys necessary to validate the token.

fields.name: Issuer
fields.description: The endpoint that issues the token.

fields.name: TokenEndpoint
fields.description: The endpoint to be used to request a token.

fields.name: WellKnownOpenIdConfiguration
fields.description: The endpoint that contains all the configuration endpoints for the provider.
